com.conceptwave.scripting
Class DataStructure

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.DataStructure

public class DataStructure
extends CwObject

Scriptable data object similar to XML DOM with fixed structure defined in the metadata

Copyright: Copyright (c) ConceptWave Software Inc. 2001-2011

Field Detail

array

public Array array
READONLY: Return Array node rendered as an array. If the node is not an Array or the node has no elements, this function returns null.

Constructor Detail

DataStructure

public DataStructure(String metadataName,
                     com.conceptwave.scripting.Object init,
                     String ruleSetTag)
Creates a new data structure instance of specified metadata type

Parameters:
metadataName - The fully qualified metadata data structure name
init - Initialization flag, if true or null, Data Structure will be initialized
ruleSetTag - RuleSet Tag to use for this initialization, validation and permission checks of this object and its children. Child objects that are either automatically created or set into this object will be assigned the current Rule Set tag for this object.

Clears (nullifies) all data elements of this object

copy

public DataStructure copy(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean copyKey)
Create a copy of this DataStructure. Child nodes that are references (ie. DataStructure elements, Documents) will be copied as well, not just their references.

Overrides:
copy in class CwObject
Parameters:
copyKey - Copy the keys of any Document nodes.
Returns:
DataStructure representing copy of this object.

has

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean has(String name)
Checks if this data structure contains a child with the specified name with data.

Parameters:
name - Child name.
Returns:
true if child with a given name exists AND is not NULL. false otherwise.

Returns:
true if the child specified by "nodeName" is an attribute node.

Returns:

mapStructureToDoc

public Array mapStructureToDoc(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object doc,
                               String name,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwException)
Deprecated. to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo().

Maps the current data structure to the specified document using the specified mapping. If no conversion map that satisfies the requirements is found, no mapping is done. If the data structure contain array of elements the method returns array of documents in which each document is mapped to the element of the data structure array. If the data structure does not contain array the method returns array of one document that is mapped to the data structure.

Parameters:
doc - The target document object or target document metadata name. This parameter is used to specify the type of the returned array of documents. If it is document its content will not change in the case the data structure contains array.
name - The conversion map name or tag. If null the default conversion map will be used.
@param - throwException If true throws exceptions if the conversion map/default conversion map does not exist.
Returns:
Array of one or more documents mapped from the current data structure

onInit

public void onInit()
Metadata script that is automatically invoked after a new datastructure instance is created. Metadata developers can initialize the datastructure with default or calculated values. The default system action is to do nothing.

remove

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean remove(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object element)
Removes the element from data structure array

Parameters:
element - The element
Returns:
Returns true if removed
Throws:
"DE0602" - exception for non-arrays

removeAt

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object removeAt(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer index)
Removes an element from data structure array by index

Parameters:
index - Element index
Returns:
Returns removed object
Throws:
"DE0602" - exception for non-arrays
